summary: An ordinance relating to the Municipal Water Supply System; authorizing construction, subject to the acquisition of the necessary right-of-way, of a 54", 60" and 66" pipeline between the regulating basin and Lake Forest Park Reservoir site as a part of the additions to, and betterments of, said System, as contemplated by Ordinance 87150; and making an appropriation from the Municipal Water Revenue Bond 1958 Construction Fund therefor.
